mapper.sql: SURETY_KEY_ID, SURETY_ID, MARGIN_ACCOUNT, CURRENCY_CD, MAGIN_SCALE, ACC_BALANCE, END_DATE, MARGIN_SORT, OPEN_BANK, ACCT_NAME, IS_JIXI, MARGIN_RATE, APPEND_FLAG, ORG_NUM, USER_NUM, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, BEGIN_DATE, APPEND_AMT
mapper.select: select rel.RELATION_ID, margin.SURETY_KEY_ID,margin.surety_id,margin.MARGIN_ACCOUNT,margin.MARGIN_SORT,margin.CURRENCY_CD,margin.OPEN_BANK, margin.ACCT_NAME,margin.MAGIN_SCALE,margin.ACC_BALANCE,margin.END_DATE ,margin.IS_JIXI,margin.MARGIN_RATE,margin.append_amt from tb_grt_margin margin,TB_GRT_COLLATERAL t3,TB_BIZ_GRT_REL rel where margin.surety_id=t3.GUARANTY_ID and t3.GUARANTY_ID=rel.surety_id and rel.apply_id=#{applyId}

select rel.RELATION_ID, margin.SURETY_KEY_ID,margin.surety_id,margin.MARGIN_ACCOUNT,margin.MARGIN_SORT,margin.CURRENCY_CD,margin.OPEN_BANK, margin.ACCT_NAME,margin.MAGIN_SCALE,margin.ACC_BALANCE,margin.END_DATE ,margin.IS_JIXI,margin.MARGIN_RATE,margin.append_amt,margin.BEGIN_DATE,margin.APPEND_FLAG from tb_grt_margin margin,TB_GRT_COLLATERAL t3,TB_BIZ_GRT_REL rel where margin.surety_id=t3.GUARANTY_ID and t3.GUARANTY_ID=rel.surety_id AND margin.SURETY_KEY_ID=#{suretyKeyId}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_GRT_MARGIN (SURETY_KEY_ID, SURETY_ID, MARGIN_ACCOUNT, CURRENCY_CD, MAGIN_SCALE, ACC_BALANCE, END_DATE, MARGIN_SORT, OPEN_BANK, ACCT_NAME, IS_JIXI, MARGIN_RATE, APPEND_FLAG, ORG_NUM, USER_NUM, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, BEGIN_DATE, APPEND_AMT) values (#{suretyKeyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suretyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currencyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maginScale,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{marginSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acctName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isJixi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marginRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{appendFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{appendAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

SURETY_KEY_ID,

mapper.update:
update TB_GRT_MARGIN
SURETY_ID = #{suretyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARGIN_ACCOUNT = #{marginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENCY_CD = #{currencyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAGIN_SCALE = #{maginScale,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACC_BALANCE = #{accBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MARGIN_SORT = #{marginSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPEN_BANK = #{openBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCT_NAME = #{acctName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_JIXI = #{isJixi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARGIN_RATE = #{marginRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APPEND_FLAG = #{appendFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NUM = #{orgNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NUM = #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BEGIN_DATE = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APPEND_AMT = #{appendAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where SURETY_KEY_ID = #{suretyKeyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_GRT_MARGIN set SURETY_ID = #{suretyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARGIN_ACCOUNT = #{marginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENCY_CD = #{currencyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAGIN_SCALE = #{maginScale,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACC_BALANCE = #{accBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MARGIN_SORT = #{marginSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_BANK = #{openBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCT_NAME = #{acctName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_JIXI = #{isJixi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARGIN_RATE = #{marginRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APPEND_FLAG = #{appendFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_NUM = #{orgNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NUM = #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BEGIN_DATE = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APPEND_AMT = #{appendAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SURETY_KEY_ID = #{suretyKeyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
